name: The Pit (itch) (Ben-Starwalker)
description:
A game based on a nightmare I had a while back. You are trapped in a monochromatic gray maze. You try to find your way to the end of it, but something feels off about the maze. You can find a map if you take the right path. 

-Completed work:

Player movement script

Flashlight

Maze construction

Enemy AI (improved the patrol so it now moves around the maze)

-Not Started:

Map

Enemy and Player models(mannequins are placeholders right now)

Cutscenes (will be in V1.0.0 release)

Ambient music (will be in future update)

Full VR Support (V2.0.0 likely, it will make use of motion controls)
